item.title: Keir Starmer Reflects On Labour's Remarkable Journey to Victory
item.description: On the eve of polls opening in the UK general election, Keir Starmer allowed himself a moment to reflect on how far he had come since he became leader of the Labour Party four-and-a-half years ago.

item.title: Labour Party Ends Conservative Era: Key Moments Of Conservative Rule In UK
item.description: Britain's Labour Party won a parliamentary election on Friday, bringing to an end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government that saw the country weather one of the more turbulent periods in its post-World War Two political history.

item.title: UK Election: What Happens Next
item.description: The transition of power in Britain is a matter of hours, not months.

item.title: How the Labour Party Wants to Change the UK Economy
item.description: With Britain’s productivity and wages stalled for the past decade and a half, the winning party in the general election faces a tall order.

item.title: Live updates: UK election results, Labour Party wins as PM Rishi Sunak concedes defeat - CNN
item.description:
1. Live updates: UK election results, Labour Party wins as PM Rishi Sunak concedes defeat  CNN
  2. ‘Let’s get to it, my friend’: world leaders congratulate Starmer on election win  The Guardian
  3. UK election live updates and results: Labour wins majority  The Associated Press
  4. Europe's leaders welcome Starmer after 'historic' UK election  POLITICO Europe
  5. In pictures: How Labour's landslide unfolded overnight  BBC

item.title: Nigel Farage Elected To Parliament On Strong Night For Reform UK As He Blasts TV Coverage Of Election: “It’s Almost Comical” - Deadline
item.description: Nigel Farage Elected To Parliament On Strong Night For Reform UK As He Blasts TV Coverage Of Election: “It’s Almost Comical”  DeadlineView Full Coverage on Google News

item.title: Incoming Prime Minister Keir Starmer appears to have been busy already, taking an international call (perhaps...
Ed Davey, leader of the Liberal Democrats, was triumphant in a victory speech to his party...
Keir Starmer hails ‘sunlight of hope’ as Britain wakes up to Labour landslide
item.description:
Labour leader promises ‘age of national renewal’ in which his government will ‘start to rebuild our country’

  • General election 2024: live news
  • UK general election results live tracker

Keir Starmer has said the “sunlight of hope” is now shining in Britain again as Labour won a landslide UK election victory, bringing a crushing end to 14 years of Conservative rule.

The Labour leader is expected to officially become prime minister later on Friday after Rishi Sunak conceded, with voters giving Starmer a large mandate to bring about change in Britain.

Continue reading...

item.title: UK general election 2024 results live: Labour wins in landslide
item.description:
With nearly all of the 650 seats declared, Keir Starmer is expected to be the new prime minister as the Labour party secures a majority. Follow the final results and find out how your constituency voted

  • UK general election 2024 – latest news live
  • Which ‘big beasts’ have lost their seats?
  • What happens now the result is in?

The House of Commons is the main lawmaking body for the United Kingdom, the other being the unelected House of Lords. It consists of 650 members, each of whom is elected by a geographical constituency of roughly equal population.

Continue reading...

item.title: Lib Dems oust four cabinet ministers as they win record number of seats
item.description:
With all but a handful of results declared, party’s tally stands at 71, beating its previous record of 62 in 2005

  • General election 2024: live news
  • UK general election results live tracker

The Liberal Democrats have taken a record number of seats for the party in the general election.

Ed Davey’s party has ousted four cabinet ministers and denied the Tories success in constituencies once held by former prime ministers David Cameron, Theresa May and Boris Johnson.

Continue reading...

item.title: ‘Let’s get to it, my friend’: world leaders congratulate Starmer on election win
item.description:
Canadian PM hails Labour’s ‘historic victory’, while Israel’s president says he hopes to ‘deepen the close friendship’

  • General election 2024: live news
  • UK general election results live tracker

The Labour party’s thumping general election victory, which ended 14 years of Conservative party rule in the UK, drew congratulations from leaders around the world – and reminded Keir Starmer of the complex global challenges he will have to navigate as prime minister.

Israel’s president, Isaac Herzog, said he looked forward to cooperating with the new British government as the war in Gaza continues.

Continue reading...

item.title: Democrats Are So Mad at Biden They Have a Brutal New Nickname for Him
Mbappé warns of 'catastrophic' political situation in France as the far right gets closer to power
Florida U.S. Rep. Luna changes course in campaign against attorney general
